4 3SIXTY to Sponsor the National Bike Trial Series....
3SIXTY to Sponsor the National Bike Trial Series....
item.description:
We are very proud to announce that 3SIXTY will be sponsoring the Nationals comp series throughout 2012.

Four of our riders are competing in the series and we’ll be promoting the comps by handing out thousands of the above leaflet at our demos through the summer.

After initial talks with the comp organisers we are looking at the option of hosting a competition round at one of our inner city demo events, could be very interesting.... watch this space...

item.title: Happy New Year!!! The inevitable reflections and predictions....
item.description:
Only two years ago we embarked on our new adventure as team 3SIXTY, as a collective of riders we broke away from our freelance work with other teams and set out to simply enjoy our work and promote our sport.

It was a risk to say the least, the income disappeared and the challenge to establish a new business has been fraught with cliche tales of cash flow and the tough economical times.

We’ve been spurred on by the great feedback received from our event clients and audiences, for every hurdle endured there were more pats on the back and repeat bookings to cement our future as an independent team.

In the last two years we have taken on very ambitious projects: world records have fallen, championship titles have been gained and retained, we have coached hundreds of kids and performed to hundreds of thousands of people at events all over the UK.

Driven by a passion for our sport we continue to grow as a team, in August 2011 our second team toured the UK and for 2012 our third team has already taken bookings.

We are regularly breaking new world records in our practice sessions and have established an international reputation as record breakers. An Arabian TV show covered our 2011 records and an Italian TV show has requested that we make more attempts live on air this Spring.

It seems that our plan to create an established business through delivering a passionate and honest service has worked beyond all expectations, almost unexpectedly we find ourselves as pioneers forging new paths with our records and bespoke event services.

As team manager this makes me incredibly proud and I cant thank everyone involved enough, all the team members have been amazing and have dedicated a huge amount of hard work, time and energy.

I sometimes worry that the team are worked too hard, that the projects are going to become too ambitious, but then I recall how much fun every project brings, even when we’re on the road for weeks at a time it rarely feels like ‘work’.

Here’s to another year of meeting impossible milestones with fun and laughter...

Ian...

item.title: World Record Success Through August 2011
item.description:
August proved to be a roller coaster month of world record success and almost success’s!! We managed to successfully break the records for ‘highest vertical drop onto a target’ and ‘highest 360 vertical drop onto a target’...

We may have failed our attempts for ‘most rail gaps on the rear wheel’ and ‘highest vertical drop’ but we certainly gave it our all and provided some top entertainment for our event clients...

Words can’t really do our efforts justice so check out this short edit of our world record antics:




















Many more record attempts are in the pipeline.... watch this space.....
